EU_POSITION.description: overall orientation of the party leadership towards European integration in 2019.

EU_SALIENCE.description: position of the party leadership in 2019 on the internal market (i.e. free movement of goods, services, capital and labor).

scores.0: European Integration is of no importance.
scores.10: European Integration is of great importance.

EU_DISSENT.description: degree of dissent on European integration in 2019.

EU_BLUR.description: how blurry was each party's position on on European integration in 2019.

EU_COHESION.description: position of the party leadership in 2019 on EU cohesion or regional policy (e.g. the structural funds).

EU_FOREIGN.description: position of the party leadership in 2019 on EU foreign and security policy.

EU_INTMARK.description: position of the party leadership in 2019 on the internal market (i.e. free movement of goods, services, capital and labor).

EU_BUDGETS.description: position of the party leadership in 2019 on EU authority over economic and budgetary policy.

EU_ASYLUM.description: position of the party leadership in 2019 on EU authority over asylum policy.

LRGEN.description: position of the party in 2019 in terms of its overall ideological stance.

LRECON.description: position of the party in 2019 in terms of its ideological stance on economic issues. Parties can be classified in terms of their stance on economic issues such as privatization, taxes, regulation, government spending, and the welfare state. Parties on the economic left want government to play an active role in the economy. Parties on the economic right want a reduced role for government.

LRECON_SALIENCE.description: salience of economic issues in the party's public stance in 2019.

LRECON_DISSENT.description: degree of dissent on economic issues in 2019.

LRECON_BLUR.description: how blurry was each party's position on economic issues in 2019.

GALTAN.description: position of the party in 2019 in terms of their views on social and cultural values. “Libertarian” or “postmaterialist” parties favor expanded personal freedoms, for example, abortion rights, divorce, and same-sex marriage. “Traditional” or “authoritarian” parties reject these ideas in favor of order, tradition, and stability, believing that the government should be a firm moral authority on social and cultural issues.

GALTAN_SALIENCE.description: relative salience of libertarian/traditional issues in the party's public stance in 2019.

GALTAN_DISSENT.description: degree of dissent on libertarian/traditional issues in 2019.

GALTAN_BLUR.description: how blurry was each party's position on libertarian/traditional issues in 2019.

scores.0: Strongly favors a liberal policy on immigration
scores.10: Strongly favors a restrictive policy on immigration

IMMIGRATE_SALIENCE.description: relative salience of imigration policy in the party's public stance in 2019.

IMMIGRATE_DISSENT.description: degree of dissent on immigration policy in 2019.

MULTICULTURALISM.description: position on integration of immigrants and asylum seekers (multiculturalism vs. assimilation).

MULTICULT_SALIENCE.description: relative salience of immigrants and asylum seekers issues in the party's public stance in 2019.

MULTICULT_DISSENT.description: degree of dissent on immigrants and asylum seekers issues in 2019.

REDISTRIBUTION.description: position on redistribution of wealth from the rich to the poor.

REDIST_SALIENCE.description: relative salience of redistribution in the party's public stance in 2019.

scores.0: Strongly supports environmental protection even at the cost of economic growth
scores.10: Strongly supports economic growth even at the cost of environmental protection.

ENVIRO_SALIENCE.description: relative salience of environmental sustainability in the party's public stance in 2019.

SPENDVTAX.description: position on improving public services vs. reducing taxes during 2019.

ECON_INTERVEN.description: position on state intervention in the economy.

scores.0: Fully in favor of state intervention.

CIVLIB_LAWORDER.description: position on civil liberties vs. law and order.

scores.10: Strongly favors tough measures to fight crime.

SOCIALLIFESTYLE.description: position on social lifestyle (e.g. rights for homosexuals, gender equality).

RELIGIOUS_PRINCIPLES.description: position on role of religious principles in politics.

scores.0: Strongly opposes religious principles in politics.
scores.10: Strongly supports religious principles in politics.

scores.0: Strongly favors more rights for ethnic minorities.
scores.10: Strongly opposes more rights for ethnic minorities.

scores.0: Strongly promotes cosmopolitan conceptions of society.
scores.10: Strongly promotes nationalist conceptions of society.
Strongly favors protection of domestic producers.

REGIONS.description: position on political decentralization to regions/localities.

RUSSIAN_INTERFERENCE.description: salience of Russian interference in domestic affairs for the party leadership.

ANTI_ISLAM_RHETORIC.description: salience of anti-Islam rhetoric for the party leadership.

PEOPLE_VS_ELITE.description: position on people vs elected representatives. Some political parties take the position that 'the people' should have the final say on the most important issues, for example, by voting directly in referendums. At the opposite pole are political parties that believe that elected representatives should make the most important political decisions.

scores.0: Elected office holders should make the most important decisions.
scores.10: 'The people', not politicians, should make the most important decisions.

ANTIELITE_SALIENCE.description: salience of anti-establishment and anti-elite rhetoric.

MEMBERS_VS_LEADERSHIP.description: position on party leadership vs. members/activists making party policy choices.

scores.0: Members/activists have complete control over policy choices.
scores.10: Leadership has complete control over policy choices.

EU_ECON_REQUIRE.description: position on fulfilling the economic requirements of EU membership.

scores.1: Strongly opposed to fulfilling economic requirements.
scores.7: Strongly in favor of fulfilling economic requirements.

EU_POLITICAL_REQUIRE.description: position on fulfilling the political requirements of EU membership.

scores.1: Strongly opposed to fulfilling political requirements.
scores.7: Strongly in favor of fulfilling political requirements.

EU_GOOGOV_REQUIRE.description: position on fulfilling the good governance requirements of EU membership.

scores.1: Strongly opposed to fulfilling good governance requirements.
scores.7: Strongly in favor of fulfilling good governance requirements.
